amendment.description: To provide that, or the amount appropriated or otherwise made available by title IV for the Army for research, development, test and evaluation, up to $10,000,000 may be available for the Combat Support Hospital - Mobile Support Hospital.

action.text: Amendment SA 4846 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Pryor.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4846 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
